title: Hawaii To Require Cashless Payments For Medical Marijuana
text:
Hot Topics
In this video, Vin Armani discusses how politicians in Hawaii are taking away citizens’ rights if they choose to use medical marijuana. A new Hawaiian statute will require cashless payments for medical marijuana. Presumably to better track and tax all transactions. Hawaii also denies gun permits to medical marijuana patients.
